replies.msg:
Liverpool start Gini Wijnaldum, Jordan Henderson and James Milner together in the Premier League for the first time since 0-0 draw against Manchester City in October. ğŸ‘€

#LFC ğŸ”´

Bobby Firmino has won the Samba Gold award for 2018 - the best Brazilian player in Europe, with 21.8% of the vote.

Marcelo (20.5%) and Neymar (18.7%) are 2nd and 3rd; Alisson (16.4%) 4th, Fabinho (2.6%) 8th.

Phil Coutinho (2.5%) is 9th. ğŸ™ˆ
